ðŸ”» Description: The Sqala (Bastion) was fiirst built in the 15th century to defend the Atlantic coast. When Sultane Mohammed Ben Abdellah decided to build a new city in Anfa (Casablanca) he rebuilt the Sqala in 1755 CE to strengthen the defense of the city.
